description:
The following change adds an online data migration to the PciDevice object.

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/249015/ (50355c45)

When we do that we normally want to couple it together with a script that will allow operators to run the migration code even for rows that do not get accessed and saved during normal operation, as we normally drop any compatibility code in the release following the change. This is normally done using a nova-manage script, an example of which can be seen in the following commit:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/135067/

The above patch did not add such a script and so does not provide admins with any tools to make sure their data is updated for the N release where we expect the data to be migrated as per our current upgrade policy (http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/upgrade.html#migration-policy)
title: mitaka pci_request object needs a migration script for an online data migration
